column3: To drive a car in rural America is freedom. Before I had a car, I'd never seen a rock and roll show, I'd never seen a comic or a show.
Cars mean nothing to me. I'm not a car guy.
I've never revved my car at a light for an attractive woman or an auto-rival, not even as a joke.
